definition: Dodge, US automobile brand, division of Chrysler LLC

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Erase and Dodge the edges of the Polaroid picture.
sentences.chinese: 擦除和道奇的边缘拍立得相片。

sentences.english: Dodge and Mrs.Dodge know each other at a college committee.
sentences.chinese: 道奇夫妇互相认识于大学里的一个委员会。

sentences.english: Baseball team, we have the Dodgers, very popular.
sentences.chinese: 棒球呢，我们有道奇队，很受欢迎。

sentences.english: After graduation, Mr. Dodgebecame a salesman, receiving commissions on all sales he made.
sentences.chinese: 毕业后，道奇先生成为一名销售员，提取销售佣金。

sentences.english: Mr. Dodge had considered her an ideal companion for himself.
sentences.chinese: 道奇先生已经将她当作自己理想的伴侣。

sentences.english: Dodger thinks Oliver is too green to be a good pickpocket.
sentences.chinese: 道奇认为奥立佛还太青涩，去做一个好扒手。

sentences.english: Three of the first four Dodgers hitters this afternoon tattooed line drives.
sentences.chinese: 道奇前四位打者中有三位都将小王的球打成安打。

sentences.english: Fans Leaving Ebbets Field after Brooklyn Dodgers Game.
sentences.chinese: 扇子离开埃贝茨球场后布鲁克林道奇队游戏。

sentences.english: Installation Dodge Ram fixed on the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 道奇公羊固订安装在天花板上。

sentences.english: With no time to dive out of the way, he leaped upward and sailed over the car’s hood.
sentences.chinese: 来不及躲闪的罗尼猛地一跃，跳至道奇车的引擎盖上。

sentences.english: Mr. Dodge and Mrs. Dodge know each other at a college committee.
sentences.chinese: 道奇夫妇互相认识于大学里的一个委员会。

sentences.english: The Dodger brand is strong, and in the eyes of fans, can be returned to greatness.
sentences.chinese: 道奇品牌的强，在球迷的眼中，可返回的伟大。

sentences.english: That's like a Trojan picking a Bruin. Or (almost) a Dodger picking a Giant.
sentences.chinese: 这就像是特洛伊人挑选木马，或者道奇队挑选巨人。

sentences.english: The front end appearance features an all - new and bold interpretation of the face of Dodge.
sentences.chinese: 前端外观特征一个全新和大胆的诠释，面对道奇。

definition: supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]
forest or meadow viper (Vipera russelii siamensis or similar)
